item.description:
This upcoming Tuesday Boston City Girls will be going to Red Sky near Faneuil Hall for their 80's Ladies Night - featured on Dirty Water TV. I checked the weather on weather.com and it should be in the mid-70's with a 10% chance of precipation! There will be a complimentary 3-course dinner for each lady with a purchase of a $10 drink! The food menu changes each week but I spoke with one of the managers and they will have for an appetizer of a soup or salad, at least one meat and vegetarian entree and one dessert.

**We Have Our Own Drink Named: City Girl Martini**

Here is their Drink Menu:

http://www.redskybost...

The cap is 25 women due to the reservation created. I placed everyone who was on the Waiting List as "Yes". If anyone cannot make it for any reason, please update your RSVP and email, call or text me so that I can notify Red Sky. Also, I would like to take pictures of us at the venue. I am looking forward to meeting all of you there!
item.how_to_find_us: IDK if the venue changed but I will be seated at the bar close to the door (with a printout of RSVP and purple highlighter!) Call/Text me at 857 574 0720.
item.name: Tuesday's Ladies Night @ RED SKY
